# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

imp_get_process_exit_code("setup_application saxs_tools" status ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
                          COMMAND ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/tools/build/setup_application.py
                          --name=saxs_tools
                          --datapath=${IMP_DATAPATH}
                           --source=${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR})
if(${status} EQUAL 0)
message("Application IMP.saxs_tools ok")
include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH} )
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})

if(${IMP_SPLIT_PYTHON_TESTS})
imp_execute_process("get_python_tests saxs_tools" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
                    COMMAND ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/tools/build/get_python_tests.py
                          --application=saxs_tools
                          ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR})
endif()


   add_executable("compute_chi" ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/applications/saxs_tools/compute_chi.cpp)
   target_link_libraries(compute_chi
    ${IMP_SAXS_LIBRARY}
${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY}
${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_DISPLAY_LIBRARY}
${IMP_SCORE_FUNCTOR_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CONTAINER_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ATOM_LIBRARY}
    ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES}
${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES}
${CGAL_LIBRARIES}
${ANN_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties(compute_chi PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/bin")
   install(TARGETS compute_chi DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR})
   set(bins ${bins} compute_chi)


   add_executable("rg" ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/applications/saxs_tools/rg.cpp)
   target_link_libraries(rg
    ${IMP_SAXS_LIBRARY}
${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY}
${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_DISPLAY_LIBRARY}
${IMP_SCORE_FUNCTOR_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CONTAINER_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ATOM_LIBRARY}
    ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES}
${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES}
${CGAL_LIBRARIES}
${ANN_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties(rg PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/bin")
   install(TARGETS rg DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR})
   set(bins ${bins} rg)


   add_executable("validate_profile" ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/applications/saxs_tools/validate_profile.cpp)
   target_link_libraries(validate_profile
    ${IMP_SAXS_LIBRARY}
${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY}
${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_DISPLAY_LIBRARY}
${IMP_SCORE_FUNCTOR_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CONTAINER_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ATOM_LIBRARY}
    ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES}
${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES}
${CGAL_LIBRARIES}
${ANN_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties(validate_profile PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/bin")
   install(TARGETS validate_profile DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR})
   set(bins ${bins} validate_profile)

add_custom_target("IMP.saxs_tools" ALL DEPENDS ${bins})


set(pybins )
foreach (pybin ${pybins})
  install(PROGRAMS ${pybin} DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR})
endforeach(pybin)

set(pytests ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/applications/saxs_tools/test/test_saxs_tools.py)
foreach (test ${pytests})
  GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
  if(EXISTS "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/saxs_tools/${name}.pytests")
    FILE(READ "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/saxs_tools/${name}.pytests" contents)
    STRING(REGEX REPLACE ";" "\\\\;" contents "${contents}")
    STRING(REGEX REPLACE "\n" ";" contents "${contents}")
    foreach(testline ${contents})
      string(REGEX REPLACE "([A-Za-z0-9_]+\\.[A-Za-z0-9_]+) (.*)" 
                           "\\1;\\2" split "${testline}")
      list(GET split 0 methname)
      list(GET split 1 docstring)
      add_test("saxs_tools.${name}.${methname}" ${IMP_TEST_SETUP} python ${test} "${methname}")
      set_tests_properties("saxs_tools.${name}.${methname}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.saxs_tools;test")
      set_tests_properties("saxs_tools.${name}.${methname}" PROPERTIES MEASUREMENT "docstring=${docstring}")
    endforeach()
  else()
    add_test("saxs_tools.${name}" ${IMP_TEST_SETUP} python ${test})
    set_tests_properties("saxs_tools.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.saxs_tools;test")
  endif()
endforeach(test)


elseif(${status} EQUAL 1)
message("Application saxs_tools disabled")
else()
message(FATAL_ERROR "setup_application failed ${status}")
endif()
